sentences.sContent: Your booking will automatically lapse unless you confirm it.
sentences.sCn: 如果不加以确认，您的预订将自动失效。

synos.tran: 失效；流逝；背离，失检；陷入

remMethod.val: laps(掉) + e → 掉下 → 失误； 失足

words.tran: 失效的；堕落的；转归他人的
陷入（lapse的过去分词）；流逝；结束

trans.tranCn: 期满终止， 失效； 衰退； 背弃
trans.tranOther: if a contract, agreement etc lapses, it comes to an end, usually because an agreed time limit has passed
a short period of time during which you fail to do something well or properly, often caused by not being careful
